data.title: Updates from Educational Psychology and Counseling & Child and Family Studies
data.meta_description: The Department of Educational Psychology and Counseling, and the Department of Child and Family Studies have recently been reimagined.
data.meta_site_name: College of Education, Health, and Human Sciences
data.text:
The Department of Educational Psychology and Counseling, and the Department of Child and Family Studies have recently been reimagined and our programs are on the move!

The programs in these departments have either been moved to a new department in our college, the Department of Counseling, Human Development, and Family Science (CHDFS) or moved to the Department of Theory and Practice in Teacher Education (TPTE).

Please see where your program has moved from the list below. If you have questions or need assistance finding your program, please connect with the CEHHS Office of Advising and Student Services.

Click here to find Information for Students Registering for CFS-Prefix Classes

Programs Moved to the Department of Counseling, Human Development, and Family Science

Counseling (MS)

Counselor Education (PhD)

Our former Child and Family Studies Community Outreach major, General Emphasis MS and PhD Programs are now in the Department of Counseling, Human Development, and Family Science.

Visit us at chdfs.utk.edu

Programs Moved to the Department of Theory and Practice in Teacher Education

School Psychology (EdS, PhD)

Educational Psychology (MS)

Our integrated early childhood and elementary teacher licensure programs are now in the Department of Theory and Practice in Teacher Education.
